Operation 'customersAll' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is identical to summary and provides no actionable information. Added details about pagination support (cursor-based as per API docs), filtering/sorting capabilities, return structure, and parameter guidance to help AI agents understand how to use this operation effectively.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all customer support customers. Supports filtering, sorting, and cursor-based pagination. Returns an array of customer objects with their contact information, addresses, phone numbers, emails, and custom fields. Use cursor and limit parameters to control pagination through large result sets.
data.reasoning: Original description is identical to summary and provides no actionable information. Added details about pagination support (cursor-based as per API docs), filtering/sorting capabilities, return structure, and parameter guidance to help AI agents understand how to use this operation effectively.

message: Operation 'customersAdd' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description lacks all essential details. Enhanced to clarify what data is accepted (from CustomerSupportCustomer schema), what is returned (newly created object with ID), and the side effect (record becomes immediately available). This helps AI agents understand the operation's full lifecycle and when to use it.

data.summary_suggestion: Create a new customer support customer
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new customer support customer record with the provided information. Accepts customer details including name, contact information (email, phone), addresses, and custom fields. Returns the newly created customer object with an assigned ID. The customer record is immediately available for use in the system.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks all essential details. Enhanced to clarify what data is accepted (from CustomerSupportCustomer schema), what is returned (newly created object with ID), and the side effect (record becomes immediately available). This helps AI agents understand the operation's full lifecycle and when to use it.

message: Operation 'customersOne' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description provides no context about what is required (customer ID) or what is returned. Added clarity about the ID parameter requirement, comprehensive return data structure, and use case guidance for AI agents to understand when to invoke this operation.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific customer by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single customer support customer record by their unique ID. Returns the complete customer object including all contact information, addresses, phone numbers, emails, custom fields, and associated metadata. Use this operation to fetch detailed information about a specific customer.
data.reasoning: Original description provides no context about what is required (customer ID) or what is returned. Added clarity about the ID parameter requirement, comprehensive return data structure, and use case guidance for AI agents to understand when to invoke this operation.

message: Operation 'customersUpdate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is too minimal. Enhanced to explain that this is a PATCH operation supporting partial updates, clarify which fields can be modified, and specify the return value. This helps AI agents understand the operation's scope and that it won't overwrite unspecified fields.

data.summary_suggestion: Update an existing customer support customer
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing customer support customer record identified by ID. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified while existing data remains unchanged. Accepts updates to name, contact information, addresses, phone numbers, emails, and custom fields. Returns the updated customer object reflecting all changes.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. Enhanced to explain that this is a PATCH operation supporting partial updates, clarify which fields can be modified, and specify the return value. This helps AI agents understand the operation's scope and that it won't overwrite unspecified fields.

message: Operation 'customersDelete' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description lacks critical information about the destructive nature of the operation. Added clarity about permanent deletion, the ID parameter requirement, expected response code (204 per API docs), and a warning that the action is irreversible. This is essential for AI agents to understand the operation's severity and consequences.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a customer support customer record identified by ID. This operation removes the customer and all associated data from the system. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion. This action cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical information about the destructive nature of the operation. Added clarity about permanent deletion, the ID parameter requirement, expected response code (204 per API docs), and a warning that the action is irreversible. This is essential for AI agents to understand the operation's severity and consequences.
